socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff giving more poison damage and a chance to inflict poison. socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.

You and nearby Allies have 24% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
